channel.title: [APPROVED]Another Cool Forum You Should Check Out!
channel.description:
Another cool forum you guys here should check out...it currently doesn't have many members, but the ones that are there are overall good, nice people.
It's currently just a forum of friends and friends' friends, but I'm working on getting it into including RS and Private Server boards. At the moment it's still a part-gaming community, most of the members are gamers. And they range from PC to all sorts of console-gamers, as well as being generally cool people. Check It Out!
The link is: [url=http://zgu.proboards38.com/]http://zgu.proboards38.com/[/url]
PS. Don't run away as soon as you see the skin lol...there's a LOT of better ones made by my friend Frog, but you have to have an account to be able to edit the skin you're using.
*EDIT* Got it cleared with Mopar :)
Oh, and if you don't mind giving a comment it would be appreciated ;)

item.title: [APPROVED]Another Cool Forum You Should Check Out!
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

my comment: waiste of my time to read 30+ fucking forums…

I READ ONLY 1!

Read full topic
item.source: [APPROVED]Another Cool Forum You Should Check Out!

item.title: [APPROVED]Another Cool Forum You Should Check Out!
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

it’s VERY easy to get 30+ people…and this forum isn’t a cheating/private server community, it’s a lot of things…it has a lot geared toward console gaming, debate topics, and general fun…my main objective is to let people know about this place rather than gain members…and i’m waiting on putting a link up until i get clearance from mopar. and another thing, it isn’t my forum, it was made by a friend of mine, and was originally made to be a place for only the people from that school…but then later was opened as a home for another forum, which was having problems, to join

EDIT

Just got it cleared with Mopar to Ad for it.

EDIT2

Would you guys mind commenting? Even if you just took a quick glimpse I’d like to hear about it. But remember, the skins are different when you join.

Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: [APPROVED]Another Cool Forum You Should Check Out!

item.title: [APPROVED]Another Cool Forum You Should Check Out!

item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

Ron’s got a point, there are alot of forums for private servers and stuff, just post it here and stuff so people can get on if they like, no point in making a forum you wont get more then 20-30 people at the most

Read full topic
